Articles.Content:
Hi,

I think, that for large and complex rockets a time warp of 1/2 or 1/3 would be very helpful graphic and physic wise.

Is there any known mod for something like this?

cheers
I'm at a point at the moment, where the game doesn't activate the decouplers any more. I guess 349 parts are too much...
I once built a rocket where 1/2 time would have been very useful for staging.
The only thing that really slows down the game for my rockets are the 150 struts, overheating, and the seperation boosters (the worst one by far, my FPS drops to 0.2 no matter how much I had before).
1/2 time warp would be really cool slow-mo
Besides, with many parts the game isn't going in real time anyway. IT seems it's dropping frames to keep up.
